translations: 用覆盖物覆盖（土壤或根部）（mulch 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: One of the most important part of gardening is mulching.
sentences.translation: 其中最重要的部分是园林复盖。

sentences.sentence: Mulching is one of the best things people can do for their plants.
sentences.translation: 农地膜是农民为植被做的保护最好之一。

sentences.sentence: Why mulching is one of the best things people can do for their plants.
sentences.translation: 如果你不，我们拥有一个复盖大文章解释你是怎么能造福植物。
